column4: hm, so does anyone have any clue as to why I get 0 audio on 11.04? lspci shows it, the sound mixer sees it, all volumes up....just...no output.
Think it's driver related but not sure. A PCI card worked at one point but we're trying to get the onboard to work.
Are all items unmuted?  I know when I install ubuntu, by default one of the s/pdif items is muted, but needs to be unmuted for sound to work (it's over hdmi)
